extension.description: Bringing you the best for 2017, this addon is jam packed with movies, tv shows, 3D, IPTV, Karaoke, music videos, music album and much much more. From the guys who brought you Specialist Streams, Beau's Place and more....Wolf Pack is the new collaboration guaranteed to mark their territory in the community. Enjoy!
extension.forum: Wolfpack can be found on facbook at https://www.facebook.com/groups/kodiwolfpack/
